title: How Much Should RBs Get Paid? Plus: Warren Sharp’s 2019 Football Preview | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
The running back market has changed, and now the system is more important than the individual position (1:00). Plus, Warren Sharp joins to discuss the biggest coaching mistakes, teams getting more savvy with contracts, maximizing offensive efficiency, hiring the right coaches, bold 2019 predictions, and more (18:30).
Host: Robert Mays, Kevin Clark
Guest: Warren Sharp

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
